overview: Shayla LaVeaux plays an overworked and undersexed young woman whose fantasies are getting the better of her in Bud Lee's Daydreams, Nightdreams. As she slowly blossoms into a fully sexual creature, her innermost desires begin to appear before her very eyes - both day and night. As her sexual visions begin to interfere with her job at a law firm and her relationship with her roommate, Shayla begins to wonder - will she lose her virginity before she loses her mind?
title: Daydreams Nightdreams
